reviews.text: Jared and his team came out, measured, came back a week later and did an amazing job. The staff was professional, friendly, and very respectful. We had them do a standing seam roof on the front porch and a small eyebrow and we just love it! Great work! Great team!

We had a bad hail storm come through and it destroyed our roof, gutters, fence and windows. Chris from MyPro Construction handled our work project and he was amazing! He's very personable and easy to work with.  MyPro handled the repairs with high quality materials and it was done in a timely manner and at a good price. If you hire Chris and MyPro Construction to do a job, you will be glad that you did. I highly recommend them for any construction and remodeling job you need to be done!

MyPro Construction did an excellent job in replacing my roof and helping me deal with the insurance company. After a windstorm earlier this year I had MyPro evaluate my roof, it was determined the roof should be completely replaced. My insurance company claimed the roof could be repaired, for less than what my deductible was. The people at MyPro helped guide me through the procedures to have a Private Adjuster evaluate the roof. After the evaluation the insurance company paid for a complete roof

I couldn’t be happier with the maintenance program from MyPro Construction and Roofing! My roof looks brand new, and the entire process was quick and stress-free. Bobby and Josh were both incredibly helpful and professional—taking the time to explain everything and making sure the job was done right. Their attention to detail and customer service really stood out. Highly recommend their maintenance program to keep your roof in top shape!

Jace was great at explaining/pointing out the issue so that I fully understood what was going on. He did a full inspection, was very professional and friendly, and the end result was a great roof repair! The guys took pictures all along the way to show me what was going on, since I couldn’t go on the steep roof.  I can’t even realize there was a repair there — it blends in so well with the rest of the roof. I would definitely recommend.

My Pro Roofing replaced our roof in August, the hot Texas temperatures! They prepared our home before starting the replacement. We had no flower, shrub, or lawn damage. Our roof was completed in 2 days. Eric was amazing, he was on site managing everything. When our roof was completed you could not even tell they had been there !! Excellent, professional, organized service. Thank you Josh @ MyPro !!!!

MyPro Construction was the roofer used this Spring for a total roof replacement after a big hail storm.  Chris O'Shea was the lead on the project and handled the project with no problems.  Everytime we had a question or request, Chris made sure that it was answered or completed.  We would highly recommend MyPro Construction for you your roofing needs!

We used MyPro Construction for two build out projects for our clothing stores in Dallas & Fort Worth and both experiences were excellent.  The team was professional, quick, and clean and the work was done right.  Our projects consisted of interior construction - hard wood flooring, paint, building walls, and fixture installation.  We found their pricing very reasonable and they were incredibly easy to work with.  We will be using them again for future construction projects!

We contacted Kyle and had someone out to service our roof within 24 hours. He went above and beyond to make sure our concerns were addressed and followed up with possible solutions. We would recommend this business and are thankful for our experience. Thank you Kyle!

I’ve known Jared Ray & his company “My Pro Construction & Roofing” now going on 2 years! He had shown himself to be a man of integrity, honest & does what he says! If he promises something, he comes through! I Don’t have to second-guess if he says: he’s gonna do it! I trust him with my “home” & the future upkeep and repairs. I wouldn’t call another guy! I “count” him as a Friend that looks out for me & my family!
Thanks
Gary AGGAS
Chris did an excellent job working with us after hail damaged our house.  He kept us informed throughout the process. The work was excellently done.  I would highly recommend them.
MyPro exceeded expectations. My project manager, Jared, handled everything and kept me completely informed from start to finish. Communication and workmanship was top notch. Would highly recommend!

As a homeowner with little to no knowledge about roofing or construction, I was honestly overwhelmed after the hailstorm hit Wylie, TX on March 25. I didn’t know where to start or who to trust and the very next day, roofers were everywhere. We had so many people knocking on the door, dropping flyers, and trying to earn our business. It was a lot to take in.

But then came Jake Gazelka with My Pro Construction and his approach stood out immediately. He was calm, professional, and not pushy at all

Great experience from start to finish. Prompt response to initial inquiry, quick inspection of problem, repair scheduled and performed without any problems. Courteous interactions and great cleanup. Highly recommended!

We signed our proposal from MyPro on Saturday afternoon and Monday at 6PM we have a completely new roof. Bobby was extremely professional throughout the entire process and they have left our property with no sign of work except the new roof and the sign in the yard. 10/10

I do not have enough space here to say all the good things about Jared Ray who was our project manager during the replacement of our roof, gutters and having the house painted. Jared is probably one of the most ethical and moral people you will ever work with. He cares about what he's doing and about who he's doing it for. This is a man you can fully depend on to do what he says he's going to do. He will go above and beyond for you.

Bobby Andrews with MyPro is the best!   He responded to my concern that I might have a leak in my ceiling (thankfully I didn’t).  I texted him in the evening time and he was out at my house the next morning.  Bobby set me up with an annual roof maintenance plan and completed repairs that were needed a.along  with cleaning my gutters and blowing off debris! His customer service skills are top notch in my book

I would like to thank Chris O’Shea for his professionalism and help throughout the entire process. I would recommend him for any other jobs.

Also, Michelle Taylor from the office was a wonderful person to talk to.

Reached out to Bobby with MyPro to give me a quote on my roof. He was on time, courteous with my extensive amount and questions and extremely professional and polite. After several other quotes I came back to MyPro and am SO GLAD I did! They did a phenomenal job both on the roof as well as the cleanup afterwards. I was so impressed and happy with their work that I recommended them to my parents, my sister and multiple friends. ALL of which went with them as well. This is a great company that doe
Jace Lane was quick to respond and very professional!  We just needed a quick fix after the inspection and he took great care of us!  Highly recommend!

MyPro is AWESOME!  We were getting pushback from the insurance company regarding hail damage and Jace at MyPro walked us through the steps to dispute the ins co's decision and in the end the ins co agreed to pay.  And on top of that, the work that MyPro did is fantastic.  Would highly recommend this company.

Had wind damage from a line of thunderstorms that blew through and decided to rearrange my shingles! MyPro not only battened down my roof better than before, like the wind never happened, but they were able to get a crew out in less than 24 …
Jake provided a thorough inspection and a detailed explanation of our needs and the products available. Haven’t quite decided to go with them yet, but very happy with the process so far.
Was given personalized customer service. Chris coordinated all the vendors and made the process seamlessly. This was an insurance claim after storm damage.

I might be one of the pickiest customers a construction company could have.  I was in construction for a good portion of my life and expect perfection.  Nothing less.  Why would I?  I was lucky enough to find and smart enough to use MyPro to have my stone-coated steel roof replaced.  It was not a simple remove/replace.  It required a few repairs and a huge upgrade to be pushed through with insurance. They skillfully worked with me to accomplish this.  It did not take a day or two but nearly two

We had them do work for our company Budget Box.
Bobby Andrews and Team are very professional, courteous and quick. Their knowledge and integrity are unmatched. We currently use them for our roofing needs, but are asking them for additional services.
We highly recommend them for any and all projects!

When you hire MyPro Construction to come out and check your roof for problems, they take detailed photographs of the problem and explain exactly what work is needed and the cost. Then when they come out, it gives you peace of mind that the job was done correctly and your roofing problems solved. We have used this company for years and we also have a yearly maintenance program where they come out twice a year to check the roof and take care of whatever adjustments or repairs that need to be done.

Jake came to inspect our roof today and we really appreciated the time he took to explain everything to us. The inspection was thorough and Jake was very knowledgeable. We’ve already recommended him to our neighbor.

Bobby completely ripped us off and charged $2500 for a small sheetrock repair. Edit: I’m leaving the company name out of this review that it was billed to so we don’t get retaliated against but I will upload a copy of the invoice so everyone can see it’s real.

Had a great experience with Jared and his team, led by Hector, on a minor roof repair. I received an estimate up front and they were very quick and professional. They also provided pictures of their completed work. I highly recommended and will use them again in the future.
Chris and mypro construction was wonderful to work with. Great communication and work was top notch! Would recommend to anyone!!

Working with MyPro to replace our roof after having hail damage was a breeze!  The worked tightly and professionally with our insurance adjuster and everything was smooth. Everyone was pleasant to deal with and efficient.  The work crew was awesome to watch, and I hate that it was during the hottest part of the summer.  They did a fantastic job with the work itself and they were thorough in the cleanup.  Highly recommend them for any project you have!

Bobby Andrews and his crew at Mypro put all of my roof concerns to rest. Bobby is prompt, transparent, professional, and ethical. He communicates with homeowners as well as insurance companies, and he insists on supervising a job until it is complete and matches the expectations of a given client. A homeowner needs a roofer who puts the safety of families first, and Bobby Andrews and the Mypro crew do just that! A sincere Thanks, Mypro!

top notch contact person (Chris) he was super helpful and informative.  Walked us through the process and only one step was slightly different but not a big deal.  The process ran smooth once we got past a few potential rain days (Chris kept us informed on when it looked like we would be able to get the roof installed).  This is the 2nd roof we have had installed on our house and my in-laws, cousin, and mother have also used this company.   I will keep singing their praises.

Bobby was excellent and his roofing knowledge was outstanding.  I research roofing for a good two months straight on the do’s and don’t’s, and what is legal and illegal.  He came at me with facts.  Needed some help and MyPro was there to help.
Jared Ray was very professional! Excellent work done by him and his crew.
Jace was really helpful and fast! He went above and beyond to create excellent experience!

After a severe hail storm we contracted with Mypro construction to have our roof replaced along with windows, screens, gutters , garage doors and painting. Chris with Mypro coordinated with all the appropriate repair people , and had all the work completed efficiently and timely. I would not hesitate to use them again and I recommend them to anyone needing repair work ..

Where is the sixth star???

If you truly want a pain-free construction experience, use MyPro. Honest, fast, and hassle-free, Bobby and his team were polite, professional and managed our expectations from the start.

Any issue we brought up with our roof replacement and gutter repair was quickly handled with courtesy and speed. The restaining of our fence and pergola made our home look even newer than before!

No need to monitor his staff. They worked quickly, efficiently, and left no trace behin
Chris was fantastic to work with. Very knowledgeable and the communication was top notch!! Highly recommend!

MyPro was on time for initial meeting and scheduled service. Chris and his crew were professional in explaining all the work to be performed and left the job site clean of any debris or materials from their work.
I'm glad I was recommended MyPro for my roofing repairs and look forward to working with them for future construction projects.

I have used MyPro for roof replacement, ceiling repairs and painting (we have had 2 water damage events- a/c water line and condensation between first and second floor) and kitchen remodel.   The crews are always on time, courteous, attentive to details,  clean up each night before they leave, receptive to add-on requests, and overall very nice, friendly, and highly skilled and professional people.  Will use them again for any additional repairs and my next remodeling project.  I highly recommen

I used MyPro Construction for the first time last week. Jace Lane, construction supervisor for MyPro, inspected my roof after the storm.  He found some minor items that needed repair. Lifted shingles, nails needing sealing and some other comparable items.  He gave me a complete inspection report and an estimate for doing the repairs.  The repair crew came out within a   day or 2 and did all the repairs. Prompt and professional service. Jace communicated with me frequently and kept me informed.

We got a new roof, new exterior paint, and a gutter tune-up completed in a timely manner.  The work was done right, the punch list was attended to quickly, the cleanup was satisfactory, and they knew how to talk to insurance companies. Our house had a few 'anomalies' (like drywall in the exterior porch ceiling) that MyPro found and replaced/repaired them.  We are very satisfied and pleased with their work.

I couldn’t be more please at the paint job performed by the crew at My Pro Construction.  Top notch and professional.  Prior to painting, the crew power washed the exterior then smoothed and sanded the years of vines which were once attached to the eaves of the house, replaced the wood-rotted window frames to finally paining the house, taking only 2 days in the intense, summer heat of over 100 degrees!  The price was reasonable and I highly recommend them My Pro.  I’d hire them in a heartbeat!

I can’t say enough good things about my experience with MyPro.  I had the pleasure of working with Russell and Bobby.  Both are pros.  Russell was my main point person.  He walked me through every step of the process of replacing the roof, took the time to explain everything, and made it so much easier than I thought it would be.  We had a new roof within a few days of signing the contract.  Russell’s dedication to our project was apparent from day one and continued throughout it.  He always jus

If you want Quality Work done on time and 100% to your satisfaction, you want MyPro!  In the last 15 years, we have used MyPro for a new roof, roof & skylight repairs for storm damage, exterior paint-wood replacement-weatherstripping, and just recently for new custom window replacements. We don't even get quotes from other professionals because we are that confident of the quality and value that MyPro provides.

We had a great experience with this roofing company. They came out quick, did good work and it was a good value too! Not overpriced or trying to do more than was necessary.
Thanks y’all! I will be recommending MyPro to family, friends and neighbors.

Jake was so thorough and professional.  He didn’t try to oversell anything and gave me complete information to go along with the pictures. I will bring using My Pro Construction for the rest of my “projects!”
Jace Lane explained all of the details for my roof replacement.  They exceded my expectations
